TopicTitle: quick question from a returning player

Articles.Content: so i have been out of the loop since 1.3 but looking into maybe making a return. But i was so used to a sea of mods and trying to put together another setup is a little frightening. But i have noticed a lot of mods doesn't explicitly say it support 1.10, but if i dig into the latest replies it looks like most do. but one of the reasons i once quit was because every time Squad released any little update half my mods would stop working. So i was wondering if this maybe isn't the case any more? And if so, at what release would you expect a mod to work from? (i.e. mods for 1.9 is expected to work on 1.10?)
There was a big compatibility break with the change from 1.7 to 1.8, but since then most plugins have remained compatible.
cool thank you
